Does anyone know if these works with skidrow update 7?

Just to clarify, these files were pulled directly from my Steam installation and I have not confirmed that they work with cracked versions of the game.

As far as I know, Bethesda hasn't incorporated any additional DRM to prevent it from working so long as your game is up to date, but I could be wrong.

@islansun
This DLC will not update/patch your game for you, you'll have to do this yourself by downloading the patch from Bethesda's website.

Since I haven't tested it myself, I would appreciate feedback from anyone that did or didn't get it to work with the latest patch.

Correction:

Only Dead Money, Honest Hearts, and Old World Blues were part of my original installation. Everything else was downloaded here at TPB and works perfectly on my system.
